programme.desc: Jeremy Jones and the Teton Gravity team head to Alaska where they struggle to find a mission due to adverse weather conditions during the filming of Higher, TGR's 2014 snowboard film.

programme.title: Speechless: The Polar Realm
programme.desc: The Polar Realm is an award-winning non-verbal visual meditation of light, life, loss and wonder at the ends of the globe. In search of an individual viewing experience aided by the absence of spoken narrative, this cinematic voyages is guided through both powerful imagery of the natural world and a poignant, original score from composer and sound artist, Miriama Young.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Salto Is The King
programme.desc: Rappelling the highest waterfalls on earth becomes a great challenge for a group of Slovak friends and it takes them to places such as True de Fer and Bras Magasin on Reunion Island, Tugela in South Africa and Angel Falls (‘Salto Angel’) in the Venezuelan Amazon. These expeditions become journeys into the unknown and the only certainty is the power of their friendship.

programme.title: Kayaking in the Laurentian Mountains
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he heads to the adventure-filled region of Québec that gets its' name from a chain of mountains the runs through it—the Laurentians. Join Ken as he explores the islands of Lac Poisson Blanc by sea kayak before putting his whitewater kayaking skills to the test on one of Eastern Canada's most popular rivers, the Rouge River.

programme.title: Chilkat Mountains HD

programme.title: Japan HD

programme.title: Blending
programme.desc: One of the keys of impressionism is the blending together of images. The definition of this movement in art is characterized by visible brush strokes, ordinary subject matters, and an emphasis on light and its changing qualities. The first project is an impressionistic landscape using oil pastels and black mat board. Then we're using dye in spray bottles to make colorful geometric designs. Learn about color blending using special tools to create interesting effects in your art journal. And finally, blend colored glue to create a piece of art.

programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: DAMSEL DISTRESS
programme.desc: Sundar is dusting the shop in the morning just before service when out of a wallet falls an old photo of a pretty girl. Grinning, Sundar shoves it in front of Chai Raja. Chai Raja taken aback at the photo sighs and looks lovelorn for a second- then shoves the wallet and photo out of sight. Sundar is distracted by another of naughty Bashas antics and doesnt think much of it until there is a swish of unusual colour at the door entrance. And there she stands! Chai Rajas old army crush! Chai Raja is at first stunned but surprise turns to shock when she holds out an invitation- for her newly opening snack shop, right next door. Chai Raja starts sweating and Sundar understands the cause for her consternation soon enough when the next day Chaha Devi (what she calls herself) opens her stand. Its a runaway hit! She is a Bharatnatyam dancer and cooks a meaner batch of fries than Chai Raja dancing bharatnatyam while she cooks so good that not only Chai Rajas clientele is wooed away, but so is Basha! There starts a hilarious and amusing dance off between Chai Raja and Chaha Devi. Chai raja is torn between anger and admiration and its all left to Sundar to salvage Hotel Californias future..and for that may need Bashas help!

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Grab a Crab
programme.desc: Once the crab is running from the eagle and enters in the GrandPAs courtyard where Keet helps him hide and they become good friends.

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Valeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: CHOR MACHAYE SHOR
programme.desc: Chai Raja is down with fever and needs to rest. He gives Sundar the charge of the tea stall on 2 conditions; one, he will make sure the customers get their orders on time and second he mustnt be disturbed. Basha overhears it and is enthralled. Sundar is ready for the assignment and so is Basha. Hapless Sundar has to struggle and juggle himself between his hungry customers, his sleeping master and fighting the villain of his life-BASHA.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: TIMBER!!
programme.desc: There is unusual rush at the tea shop as customers seem to be pouring in. Chai Raja efficiently whips up teas but they are running short of chairs. Sundar runs pillar to post to seat the customers, even though Basha is trying his best to trip him up. Sundar then has an unusual brainwave- sure that he will impress his boss, Sundar throws open the closet and pulls out some chairs that had been stacked in a while ago. Proudly he sets them up and looks over to Chai Raja for a pat on the back- but then termites march out from under the old chairs...up and down the shop, chewing the tables/chairs...Sundar runs to keep them from crashing but Basha is all for helping the termites out. He glibly channels them this way and that and Chai Raja gawks as his customers who sit on chairs end up squatting on sawdust. Chai Raja discovers that its Sundars brainwave thats responsible for this wave of pests! Its crunch time for the termites and Sundar...and he better hurry else Chai Raja will be left with handle-less pans and a pile of dust instead of furniture!

programme.title: Orders up
programme.desc: Business is good and Chai Raja is grinning wider with each ring of the cash register. His mood gets a further lift as a guy in a black suit (an agent) enters with a briefcase marked Top Secret. As Sundar delivers tea to the agent, he is intrigued by the briefcase. Basha chooses to make off with the snacks of the customer at the adjacent table at that very minute. Sundar leaps at Basha and in his hurry upsets the agents plate and tea, knocking down the briefcase. Chai Raja is immediately at agents side, apologizing- he absently picks the briefcase back up(not noticing a fallen plate-like device) and gives it to the agent. The annoyed agent leaves and Sundar gets extra chores as punishment. Basha cant help taunt Sundar as he is stuck doing the chores- In a fit of anger, Sundar chases Basha back into the hotel and randomly hurls the plate like device. Before the chase can continue though, Sundar is sharply reprimanded and hauled off by Chai Raja. Basha meanwhile finds the object that Sundar had just thrown a tad bizarre and pokes around. Lo! It turns out to be a gadget that can make just about anything levitate! Chuckling impishly, Basha sets off towards the hotel, gadget at ready intent on helping Sundar get every order UP! The chaos gets out of hand when Basha sends the device into overdrive and is himself lifted off and bounced around. In the end however, the agent returns and reclaims the device much to the relief of all who drop back down.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Rest
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: Newspaper
programme.desc: The best news is that Hepi and Briko have figured out some exciting DIYs!

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Pinecone
programme.desc: Creativity has no limits, watch Hepi and Briko transform these cones into something lovely

programme.title: I'm fine!
programme.desc: The twins encounter in the woods an owl who can’t see very well, but won’t admit it. Until the twins give him a strange pair of glasses.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Hiccup! Hiccup!
programme.desc: Scot tries to surprise Duda when he hears Duda approaching, but Duda ends up scaring Scot. Sudden fear gives Scot hiccups. Bubbles tells Doubt that if he cant stop having hiccups before the sun sets, then hell have hiccups forever. Thinking the hiccups are cool, Duda rushes to tell Scot the "good" news. However, the "good" news makes Scot desperate to get rid of his hiccups quickly. He tries every trick in the book, but nothing seems to work. Feeling dejected, Scot becomes kind and lets Duda have his precious Scottie Buddy. However, when he sees Duda driving recklessly, Scot rushes after him. After ending up at the lake, Scot notices that his hiccups have disappeared. Doubt, on the other hand...

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: The Magical Flying Horse
programme.desc: The spoilt nephew of the Grand Vizier comes to town and there is a competition to make the boy who has everything something to make him smile for his birthday. When Jamillah asks him what he wants, he asks for a flying horse! Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie do their best to make a flying horse but its beyond Genies powers. In the end Jamillah saves the day by making the boy an origami paper horse with wings that makes him smile.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Frogs – The Frog Prince
programme.desc: On this occasion, detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the "Frog Prince", having been called out by the PRINCESS. The PRINCE, who is no longer a frog thanks to the PRINCESSs kiss, has started croaking and catching flies again, after eating a piece of cake. The PRINCE, the victim of a second spell, is gradually turning back into a frog. SANDRA and FO venture into a swamp, full of dangers and mysteries, in search of the sorceress BÁRBARA, in the hope of finding an antidote.

programme.title: The Guide’s Servant – Ali Baba
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her crazy assistant FO travel into the story of ALI BABA AND THE FORTY THIEVES, having been called out by ALI BABA’S WIFE. A week ago, ALI went to the forest to cut wood and he still hasnt returned. The detective and her assistant go into the cave of the 40 thieves and discover that AALI BABA has been taken prisoner, condemned to clean their enormous treasure for the rest of his days. SANDRA and FO release ALI, but before they have time to escape the THIEVES return to their cave. The detective leads ALI BABA and her assistant on a perilous journey through the bowels of the earth, following the enigmatic tracks of an ancient traveller, the sailor AL IDRISI.

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: The Green Monkey - The Thousand And One Nights
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the exotic world of The Thousand and One Nights, having been called out by the VIZIER of Baghdad. His daughter, SCHEHERAZADE has mysteriously lost her voice, when there is just one more night to go to reach the magic number 1001. If SANDRA and FO don’t manage to solve the case and remedy the problem, SCHEHERAZADE will not be able to tell the last story to the SULTAN and will be executed the next morning

programme.title: The Emperor Comes to Town
programme.desc: The Emperor of China is coming to town and the people of Baghdad are tasked to put on their best show as he passes through the market. Genie is thrilled, what talent shall he put on to impress the Emperor? Jamillah has a great idea for a circus act, and she asks them both to help her do a running cartwheel only they all fall over when they try in front of the Emperor and a very angry Grand Vizier. Just when hes about to send them all to jail however, the Emperor chuckles, he thinks its all hilarious! As a prize he invites them all to dine with him and the Sultan.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Biggerish
programme.desc: Maple is tired of being small, but when she eats the fruit of the Biggle Tree in atop Zoonihorn Mountain, she grows so big, she becomes a destructive giant!. Be careful what you wish for; persevere, no matter what the problem.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Friday finds a stray puppy, but its Fred and Brains who fall in love with it, paying more attention to the pooch than to him. When he starts to suspect the puppy of being more evil than he seems, they don’t believe him. Indeed, the puppy turns out to be a brilliant alien mastermind, intent on global domination.

programme.title: King Zac
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Crushing Friday
programme.desc: Fred impresses his pals when he enters their favorite Robot Battle TV show (using Friday as his robot of course). When Friday demolishes the fan favorite however, instead of cheering Fred, they mourn “Speedy” the crushed bot. Brains rebuilds Speedy and her own girl robot, “Little Miss Missile Hands.”

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Ya no es secreto
programme.desc: Nyuta trabaja en una tienda y mantiene a su familia. Su esposo y su hermano no le ayudan en nada.

programme.title: Cómo encontrar a alguien que sea para siempre
programme.desc: La vida de la estrella de fútbol Jenna corre peligro por descubrir el encubrimiento de la muerte de un jugador

programme.title: Aquí viene la novia
programme.desc: Para ayudar a su padre, Irina acepta organizar la boda de Juliana, pero descubre que el novio es su ex.

programme.title: Aquí viene la novia
programme.desc: Para ayudar a su padre, Irina acepta organizar la boda de Juliana, pero descubre que el novio es su ex.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 4

programme.title: Al Arabiya News

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and the Indians-1935
programme.desc: A Native American hunter tries to hunt two ducks. A cow saves them, so the hunter goes after the cow

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words "THE END."

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Balloon Land-1935
programme.desc: The inhabitants, including the trees and rocks, of Balloon Land are made entirely of balloons. They come under attack from the evil Pincushion Man. With the help of a quickly inflated army, they manage to fend off the attack.

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: It's Hummer Time 1950
programme.desc: A cat chases a hummingbird and repeatedly stumbles onto the property of a sleepy bulldog, who punishes the cat for each interruption of his slumber.

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors- 1960
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Speak Easily 1932
programme.desc: A timid professor inherits a large sum of money and decides to fund a terrible musical.

programme.title: The Rounders-1914
programme.desc: Two drunks live in the same hotel. One beats his wife, the other is beaten by his. They go off and get drunk together. They try to sleep in a restaurant using tables as beds and are thrown out. They lie down in a rowboat which fills with water, drowning them--a fate apparently better than going home to their wives.

programme.title: Caught in a Cabaret 1914
programme.desc: Charlie is a clumsy waiter in a cheap cabaret and must endure the strict orders from his boss. He meets a pretty girl in the park and pretends to be a fancy ambassador but must contend with the jealousy of her fiancé.

programme.title: Our Gang Follies of 1938
programme.desc: The gang is putting on a show with Alfalfa billed as "King of the Crooners." But Alfalfa abandons the show saying his crooning days are over, and that opera is his true calling. But after taking a nap and dreaming of a successful future in popular music, he changes his mind and joins the rest of the gang for the closing number

programme.title: The Stolen Jools 1931
programme.desc: The boys and a Los Angeles police detective investigate the theft of actress Norma Shearer's jewelry.

programme.title: The Floorwalker by Charlie Chaplin 1916
programme.desc: The Tramp is tricked into impersonating an embezzling floorwalker in a department store.

programme.title: The Lucy Show 1966; Season 5;Episode 5; Lucy and the Ring-a-Ding Ring
programme.desc: Lucy tries on an expensive ring Mr. Mooney had made for his wife, it looks like the bank manager won't be able to give his spouse the anniversary present - it gets stuck on Lucy's finger.

Battle of Greed 1937
programme.desc: When silver is found in Virginia City, Lawyer John Storm leads a group from Indiana west. He soon has to defend them all in court against a company that is after their claims. Fighting a crooked Judge, he gets a mis-trial by telling how much each of the jurors was bribed. Then he gets the Governor to appoint a new Judge. But just as the retrial opens, the Judge learns his daughter has been kidnaped.

programme.title: Pampita por Swarovski + New York Fashion Week + Educación en medicina estética | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV
- Cobertura del #newyorkfashionweek: Entrevista al diseñador argentino Panni Margot, el homenaje a #AgathaRuizDeLaPrada, experiencia TresEmmé y todo el backstage exclusivo. - Hablamos con Pampita en el relanzamiento de #Swarovski en Argentina. - Hablamos con Teresa Ortega y Mariano Retamal sobre la nueva plataforma educativa de medicina estética de @MedexxHighTechnology.

programme.title: LAFS 2024 Miami con Stef Roitman + Reducir la celulitis + Decoración de interior | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 16/11/24:
- Cobertura del @latinamericanfashionsummit: Lucía Ugarte entrevistó a #StefRoitman, #calleypoche, a Samantha (co-fundadora de #LAFS) y además, "La Torres" nos cuenta cómo va el desarollo de su negocio luego de haber ganado el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation. - Fuimos al lanzamiento oficial de #Alidya en Argentina y conocemos todos los detalles de su nuevo producto para la prevención y reducción de la #celulitis - En un nuevo episodio de #YoJefa, conocemos la historia de Lorena Sauer, quién emigró de Argentina en los años 2000 y hoy vive en #Miami triunfando con la #decoraciondeinteriores.

programme.title: Ale Vigil Winemaker + Bodega Bonfati + Pasarela federal + Anabel Sanchez
programme.desc: Chicas Guapas is the first TV and online community of fashion, beauty and lifestyle with #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas. They are Latin American influencers in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Costa Rica, Venezuela and the UK. In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: NAOMI SCOTT: estreno de SMILE 2 + Desfile MARIAN SAUD + Yo Jefa | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 09/11/24:
- Entrevista exclusiva de Lucía Ugarte a #NaomiScott por el estreno de #Smile2. - Cobertura del desfile de Marian Saud: Rox habló con la diseñadora y con invitadas de lujo como Candela Ruggeri, #milettfigueroa, Sofía Macaggi, Stephanie Demner y Agustina Casanova. - Tráiler de "Cómo si fuéramos sólo amigos", la nueva comedia romántica de Sebastián Badilla y Manu Viale, con Lucía Ugarte como productora ejecutiva. - Lanzamiento de #Skin1004 en Argentina: hablamos con #pampita, Paula Chávez y @SimonScaranoDermatologo. - #YoJefa: la historia de Niki Baratt, la creadora de "Niki beauty bar".

programme.title: Guest Chef Jarvis Belton
programme.desc: Chef Jarvis Belton was the executive chef at Slutty Vegan. He’s a genius chef. We dig into what it really means to be a great chef. Amazing conversation.

programme.title: Guest Joshua Rothman
programme.desc: Slavery is America's dirty little secret, which is why there's so many misconceptions and misinformation that's in history books and circling around society today. The hierarchy of slavery, the business that it took to make it work and become successful, and the slave societies that thrived as a result of it are all not often talked about. Listen in to a fascinating conversation with Joshua Rothman, author and professor at the University of Alabama, that starts with the origins of slavery, to the ships, and then to the plantation. Regardless of which part you look at, a slave trader was involved every step of the way.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Challenge The Shadow
programme.desc: No challenge, no change. In “Challenge The Shadow,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us that things can change when we bring our doubts and shame to the light of God’s presence.

programme.title: God Chose You... Will You?
programme.desc: God didn’t say “do you” — He said “I knew you.” In “God Chose You… Will You?,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us move past our limitations and step into who He made us to be all along.

programme.title: I'm Not Stuck Unless I Stop
programme.desc: In “I’m Not Stuck Unless I Stop,” Pastor Steven unpacks the first mindset of his latest book, “Do The New You,” to teach us how to keep praising God before we see the victory.

programme.title: Christ Is In Me. I Am Enough.
programme.desc: I am enough because Christ is in me. Pastors Steven and Holly Furtick join forces to discuss breaking free of the trap of self-doubt and stepping confidently into our identity as children of God.

programme.title: WIth God There's Always A Way, And By Faith I Will Find It
programme.desc: In “With God There’s Always A Way, And By Faith I Will Find It,” Pastor Rich Wilkerson reminds us that our prayers might not be answered when or how we expect, but with God they will be better than we could have imagined.
